name: EECOM
description:
• E - Emergency
  • E - Environmental and
  • CO - Consumables
  • M - Manager

You are in charge of keeping the environment of a space station stable. You cannot let the readouts get too high or too low to keep the crew healthy and safe. How long can you keep the situation nominal?

How to play

Drag knobs to turn them. 

Double tap the knobs to set them to zero.

Drag sliders to move them.

The readouts are shown on dials above the input. (The viewport of the station is also a readout)
